document_data.name: ''Mountain Fist''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mountain Fist''''' was the unique enchanted [[dwarf|dwarven]] two-handed [[club]].
document_data.Description: This oversized yet uncannily lightweight club was created using a clutched fist of a [[petrified]] [[ogre]].
document_data.Powers: ''Mountain Fist'' possessed the ''+2'' enchantments and increased the wielder's strength. When used against [[construct]]s, ''Mountain Fist''  became a devastating ''+5'' enchanted weapon.
document_data.History:
''Mountain Fist'' was a fabled magic item that originated from the dwarves of pre-[[Weeping War]] [[Myth Drannor]]. According to a legend, the master of the ''Mountain Fist'' fell to the chilly life-draining touch of [[shadow]]s sometime in the past. Returning to existence as a [[shadow]], the master of the ''Mountain Fist'' slithered into the deepest parts of the [[Dwarven Dungeons]] along with the enchanted weapon.

In [[1369 DR]], ''Mountain Fist'' could be found inside a chest in the [[Deep Halls]] of the Dwarven Dungeons guarded by [[skeleton]] lords and [[shadow]]s. Once the chest was opened, the ancient master of the enchanted club appeared out of the inky darkness of the dungeon along with two other [[shade]]s attacking the people who dared to take its treasure.

The blind [[cleric]] of [[Mystra]] [[Beriand]] was familiar with the weapon's lore and shared the legend with the group of adventurers from [[Phlan]] who were making their way through the ruins in order to stop the [[Cult of the Dragon]]'s plot to corrupt the city's ''[[mythal]]'' and ''[[pool of radiance]]''.
